headline: Magnificent 7 Diverge As Peak Earnings Season Puts Spotlight On Big Tech
summary: Peak earnings season for Q2 2025 begins this week. So far 34% of companies from the S&P 500 index have reported, and the early results bode well for the rest of the season. Read more here...

headline: PPG Industries to Report Q2 Earnings: What's in the Cards?
summary: PPG's Q2 earnings are likely to have been hit by weak industrial demand and auto production, with cost cuts and pricing efforts acting as tailwinds.
